title: Venture funds eye recovery in 2024, but capital remains tight
description:
Investors are focusing on more liquid, growth-ready startup opportunities as crypto venture capital continues to recover.

Markets may be looking better for venture funds and startups seeking capital, but money is still tighter than the last bull cycle, industry insiders told Cointelegraph. 

Investors are looking for compelling stories and strong metrics before investing in 2024. According to Carlos Pereira, partner at BitKraft Ventures, funds have been spending more attention on liquid or pre-launch opportunities in startups:

A divergence between these markets means that investor interest may be moving in different directions. While public markets — formed by stocks, bonds and securities — might continue to attract investment, private markets, like venture capital funds, might see a reduction in available funding.

Read more

title: Bitcoin Network’s Mining Difficulty Drops 3.9% to 70.34 Trillion, Easing Miner Workload Amid Texas Cold Snap
description: On Saturday, the Bitcoin network experienced its first difficulty reduction of the year, witnessing a 3.9% decrease at block height 826,560. As a result, the network’s mining difficulty now stands at 70.34 trillion, with the next adjustment anticipated on Feb. 4, 2024. Bitcoin Difficulty Slips to 70.34 Trillion, Lightening Load for Miners Mining bitcoin (BTC), […]

title: Wells Fargo Refuses to Reimburse Customers After Mysterious Withdrawals Discovered – Here’s Why the Bank Won’t Budge
description:
A North Carolina couple who says a pile of money mysteriously vanished from their account has been denied reimbursement from banking giant Wells Fargo. Susan Cheek says she and her husband quickly noticed when $1,200 was sent from their Wells Fargo bank account to Western Union in two unauthorized transactions, reports the CBS-affiliated news station […]

title: Franklin Templeton CEO Says She’s Seen Bitcoin Demand Around the World, Touts “Suite” of Opportunities in Crypto
description:
The perception of Bitcoin (BTC) as a safe haven asset provides a price floor for the top cryptocurrency, according to Jenny Johnson, the president and chief executive of global investment giant Franklin Templeton. Johnson says in a new interview with CNBC that the demand for BTC is evident after the launch of new spot Bitcoin […]
